name: The Windshield Wiper
summary: Inside a café, after lunch and while smoking a whole pack of cigarettes, a middle-aged man asks himself and the audience an ambitious question: What is Love?? A collection of vignettes and situations will lead the man to the desired conclusion.
info:
• 中文名: 雨刷器
  • 话数: 1
  • 别名: 皆为爱
  • 上映年度: 2021年7月
  • 片长: 15分钟
  • IMDB: tt9464038
  • 导演: Alberto Mielgo
